title: Introducing: Palace
body:
Google ‘[**Palace**](https://www.

facebook.com/wearepalace/timeline)‘ and you’ll inevitably get a whole heap of pretty cool buildings, but if you stick with it you’ll eventually scroll through to these guys. Describing themselves as “laid back guitars with brooding vocals” sums them up well but is definitely modest. These guys are kind of like **Morrissey** being pulled effortlessly into 2014. Their tracks are perfectly orchestrated featuring hints of **Paolo**\-style vocals which blends to create a fresh and original sound. Their deput EP, _Lost in the Night_, is out on 20th October and both of their London launch shows have already sold out. For those not lucky enough to grab tickets, check out their beautiful cover art by Wilm Danby and give their two available tracks, _Veins_ and _Bitter_, a listen.
